verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Asleep in Jesus! blessed sleep, newline From which none ever wakes to weep! newline A calm and undisturbed repose, newline Unbroken by the last of foes.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Asleep in Jesus! O how sweet, newline To be for such a slumber meet! newline With holy confidence to sing, newline That death hath lost its venomed sting.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Asleep in Jesus! peaceful rest, newline Whose waking is supremely blest! newline No fear, no woe, shall dim that hour newline That manifests the Savior's pow'r.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Asleep in Jesus! O for me newline May such a blissful refuge be! newline Securely shall my ashes lie, newline And wait the summons from on high.
